JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Green Island CPH is looking for bartenders, pizza makers, floor staff, baristas
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Green Island CPH is a floating café/summerbar in the heart of Copenhagen.

We are looking for full time or minimum 20 hours pr. week staff, who are service minded, dedicated and able to contribute to the positive atmosphere of the island, also when there is a customer peak. 

All employees will be assigned to more than one position (could be bartending, behind the till, food-preparation, service), so we will talk with every staff-member and together find out, which positions will be the best match.

We are a team of 23 co-workers from 7 different countries and we hope to expand our team with danish or english speaking collegues, primarily in the age group from 20-35 years.

We find the best result, when we get to know one another, so we value social gatherings after work, staff parties and the general "family feeling", when we go to work.



For more info: 
https://www.green-island.dk/
